results.title: PRSS1-Related Hereditary Pancreatitis
results.text_hl: Pancreatic enzyme replacement therapy to improve digestion in those with @DISEASE_Exocrine_Pancreatic_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D010188 @@@pancreatic insufficiency@@@ and @DISEASE_Gas_bloat_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C535647 @@@bloating@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Steatorrhea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D045602 @@@steatorrhea@@@, @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, unexplained @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, and/or @DISEASE_Immunologic_Deficiency_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D007153 @@@micronutrient deficiencies@@@ (e.g., vitamins A, D, B<sub>12</sub>); treatment of @DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@glucose intolerance@@@ with a regimen typically including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Adam MP, Everman DB, Mirzaa GM, Pagon RA, Wallace SE, Bean LJH, Gripp KW, Amemiya A, Shelton C, Solomon S, LaRusch J, Whitcomb DC. PRSS1-Related Hereditary Pancreatitis . 1993;():. PMID: 22379635
